title: Victorious Skins
body:
Hey guys! I'm but a humble player from New Zealand on the OCE server. I sent a ticket in to Riot Support who suggested and I quote 
****************************************************************************************************************
"Hello,

Your suggestion is a good point of view and I recommend you post this to the Boards as we cannot pass feedback directly to the devs. The team is always looking at the Boards to get a feel for things players think could be improved.

You can find the Boards here:

NA Boards: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous

Thanks again for sharing your idea. We are always trying to improve and your idea or suggestion matters."
****************************************************************************************************************
My question was about Victorious Skins and my ticket said this,
****************************************************************************************************************
 "As we know each year around October the Victorious Champion is named and we get the skin for it if we've earned Gold + ranks. Just wanting to know, has it ever been thought to put all Victorious skins as an option and let the player decide for themselves?

For example, I only really started playing League end of Season 5 when Victorious Sivir was released, she was my first main and will always be my favourite ADC but am so gutted I'll never get her Victorious skin. So what I mean is, at the end of the season, has it been thought maybe put up each Victorious skin and let the player choose what they want? 
(so maybe have them all and let someone choose Sivir or Elise etc).

It feels like it would be more rewarding to be able to choose which champion we would like a Victorious skin with. I am grateful for getting a free Maokai skin, but I never play him unless it's aram and I have no rerolls (so last year I would've picked Sivir or Morgana over Maokai, if this makes sense).

I've got over 200,000 points in Sivir as you can see with the screenshot and I would so so so love to have her Victorious Skin (I actually do and sent a screenshot in lol).

But has it been thought to let players choose their Victorious skin or will it be something Riot would consider in the future?
****************************************************************************************************************

Anyways, what do you guys think? Like at the end of the season if you've earned Gold - Challenger, Riot should have every Victorious Skin available and you choose to have J4 or Morgana etc? Or the new Victorious Champion, if you'd like of course. I know plenty of Janna and Elise mains who didn't play League in those respective seasons. 

If someone already has Victorious Morgana, they can get a special border around their skin (think project maybe) showing they were around in season 4 and got the skin at the time?

RIOTERS IF YOU'RE READING THIS PLEASE REPLY WITH YOUR THOUGHTS TOO :D

I would LOOOOOOOOOOOVE this.  Victorious Janna came out right before I started playing, and I wasn't able to get her, and I was so sad.  That's honestly the only one of the skins that I really want, I mean, I would consider selling a small, unnecessary organ or two!  ....didnt say they would be mine....  But I often thought that when a person became eligible for the rewards, they might one day be able to choose one of the prior victorious skins.

I wouldn't be surprised if they did something like they did for the original Championship Riven where they just add a little crown to the skin and a load screen border for those who had it originally. Personally, I think just allowing other people have your idea would just diminish the accomplishment of those who struggled to reach Gold for those skins. 

Although technically you're still reaching the same requirement as those before, ranked population and meta has changed drastically over the years. 
A player in Bronze season 1 and 2 was probably about equal to Gold now since there were a vast amount of players who were unranked just due to their elo being too low. With such a small amount of players even having a rank tier it made getting a Victorious skin a massive accomplishment. Meanwhile now with all the ranked safety nets such as free wins for failing promos, people placing as high as Platinum fresh out of placements, and not dropping a tier for a few games after you promote, it's simply not as impressive now as it was back then. A player in Season 8 for example choosing to get Victorious J4 would not be the same at all as a player who worked for that 7 years before him.

> [{quoted}](name=JukeMaster420,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ee88EyEi,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-09-13T04:05:59.258+0000)
>
> Tbh Makkii just seem like the douche to tell you he's got food but won't share it with you in class or something. Only wants to have it for themselves and is like "haha you can't have this get rekt ggez noob". People have earned Victorious Skins, that's my point. Why shouldn't we be able to choose which one? I agree with Tormentula in saying it adds value because it adds a unique feature to the skin(s). I have Neo Pax {{champion:15}} and if they re-released it again (Riot said they'd never do it but just as an example) and they added on a watermark or border to the skin (like the did with normal Pax {{champion:15}} ), I would love it as it adds something to the skin, a little feature showing I had it originally. If they added something to Victorious {{champion:57}}  it shows that I was there in season 6 when I originally earned the skin.

You shouldn't be able to pick which one because each skin symbolizes a different season.

Don't sit here and try to straw man my intentions.

Something you need to understand, is that at the very least, if it wasn't explicitly said, it was implicitly promised following the conclusion of season 2 and the release of a different victorious skin, instead of jarvan again, that these skins were exclusive, changing that would be an outright betrayal to older players who earned them, and riots already in hot water with them over things like this.

also it makes no sense to claim that adding a border to these skins for loading screens than changing them from exclusive to inclusive, would add value, it subtracts value, because yeah you have a border sure, but now everybody has the same exact skin you do.

supply and demand, learn it

Hopefully, for those that actually play rank flex and got gold or higher on both solo queue and flex queue, can get 2 victorious skins, with the second skin being the players choice. Those that think rank flex is not actually rank, go back and read the info since the beginning of the season and see how much time you wasted not playing. I got both ladders in gold.

I really wish they pulled through, I understood why victorious skin were so special to be limited..

But lets be honest, who gives a shit if you're victorious janna, elise, etc the skin literally means nothing today. The skins came to a point where half of them aren't even the original account owners, and the other quarter never even play that specific champion in their life time. It feels really shitty to main a champion with a victorious skin that you can never have strictly because you didn't join sooner. 

Basically, they lost value to begin with. A lot of victorious accounts are just gold smurfs profiting on ebay to begin with. Even the supply isn't that small. Riot could kill that market really easily too by making them available, even not as the originals with borders. 

I seriously don't care if riot gave a chroma for Victorious Elise that is all rusty and looks awful, just the fact I possess the skin in any form would make me feel complete. I resonate with Victorious Elise so well, everything about it, but sadly that resonation is denied off of the fact I can't ever be behind the keyboard of it. 

I got over it awhile ago, but it came to the point where I realized it really truely eats at me so badly that I can't have it, and every champ select practically taunts me since I have to be constantly reminded "this is locked forever, hf in your next game without it 1.6 mil main!"

Please consider returning Victorious Skins riot, not only does it benefit the company and stop account trading (slightly anyway), but as more players join this game, more people get hurt over the minority of seasons past through this skin line, and the issue only expands with every new addition. A loading screen border worked out fine for champ riven, Owners of a Victorious Skin would work out just as well. At this point the only people saying no to readding them this way are owners of the skins already who simply don't care about everybody else having them, they just want to brag more about how they don't play Morgana and show off the skin against their opposing Morgana main that just started.

Imagine if an mmo came out tomorrow and you got a special costume for preordering, and then five years later Simone comes along going "well uhhh, half these players with this exclusive skin don't even play anymore and i really want this costume, so you should rerelease it in the cash shop, and for the veterans who still play?? Ummm yeah how about put a small water mark on their version of the costume, itlll be the exact same thing, but they will have an EXCLUSIVE logo, that's sure to make em happy"

I would be fine with that. 

I sure as hell wouldn't give a shit if the victorious skins I owned got this treatment. The cash shop, not so much as the skins should still be considered "rewards" (like the option is available only for a particular rank+) but that's not what any of us are asking for. We're stating we've earned this skins in every way besides the date. As long as there's a clear indication that "this account got it legit" (ignoring a purchased account) then I see absolutely no degrading of value for the skins then there already is, if anything a border would add more value to the skin then it has now. 

I believe the difference between what you described is that you're *paying* for the content. You're paying extra with the expectancy that its limited, and if it becomes available later on, then it feels like you were cheated out of something. In the Victorious Skin case, you're not paying for anything, you simply just played 10 ranked game placements and waited to see who it is (in my case) only to know its not who you want. They're meant to be limited rewards you earn, none of them were really earned unless your first climb to gold was a learning curve as its uphill from there. 

I certainly didn't earn this season's, 10 game, boom free skin somebody in silver will cry when they see later.

> [{quoted}](name=makkii,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ee88EyEi,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-13T01:50:56.622+0000)
>
>I suppose you want to hand out my king rammus and ufo corki skins to every player?

Not necessarily, those (and judgement kayle) were specifically for playing the game at a specific time. No work or money involved, basically just be there. Additionally they have no future additions as a "skinline" to set a standard (lets say riot released a new skin for free every year for playing like UFO corki, then at that point players like corki mains would be upset why we're getting champion x over UFO corki). The requirement was to be there, made very clear. 

Victorious Skins were more as rewards for getting gold, and that was it. Difference being we just change the Victorious champ every year and didn't return the previous ones yet. So every year it feels like a slap to the face given you're forced to get a skin for something you may not enjoy when a skin for something you do enjoy already exist. The requirement was get to gold, which many have, but we're still not getting what we wanted.

Basically, as you say some players worked hard for a skin for their champion, but others who joined later miss that opportunity entirely, they don't get to work at all even though some would be motivated enough to get to challenger for them.

Hell naw to the naw naw naw, hell to the naw.....

But really, outside of the achievement itself each skin symbolizes ones participation in that particular season and as such this would be a huge slap in the face to older players.

Accidentally deleted my earlier comment so I'm adding it here

How would adding a border add value? If it's exclusive now, then becomes exclusive later, an exclusive border would only lessen the depreciation in value, it would still be a depreciation of value based on loss of exclusivity, that's basic supply and demand.

Furthermore, it may not have taken much effort for you now or even in previous seasons, but for others that might not have been the case, and as such each skin is a symbolic congratulations from riot to the player for THAT season that they put effort into.

Finally, you mention the only difference between you and those players is date, as if to claim that isn't a valid metric to discriminate by, by that same logic I suppose you want to hand out my king rammus and ufo corki skins to every player?

No thank you. I missed out on j4 by being new and ignorant. I missed out on Janna because real life ganked me. (I'll likely miss out on this season too since history repeats Itself.) I do not feel riot should return these skins to be available under any circumstances.

Riot has already whored out so many exclusive skins and tries justifying it with gimmicky boarders that took little effort to produce. We need to keep at least one set of skins sacred and that should be ranked's victorious.
I think riot mentioned something about bringing back old victorious skins last year.
About two years ago (actually further I think... whenever morg was coming) they tried to run a survey for victorious chromas each year but the community said no.
